link_text: What is the current state of the network?
What are the top sources/destinations of flows?
What are the top flows by organization?
What do individual flows look like?
What are the top flows by country?
What are the flows by science discipline?
What are the flows by project?
Who are the top talkers over time?
What are the patterns in science data transfers in the network?
What are the bandwidth patterns in the network?
What are the current flow data summary statistics?

panels.content:
See Individual Flows for $Country

Flow Data by Country

This dashboard shows the flow data for the selected country.
The first set of tables show top ten data by both volume and rate and then the set of top pairs of organizations sharing data.
Other statistics about data to and from this country, including a Sankey graph for the top sources by volume, is then listed.
Please note that rate will be zero if only one sampled flow was detected.
All times are displayed in browser local time.

options.content:
See Individual Flows for $Country

Flow Data by Country

This dashboard shows the flow data for the selected country.
The first set of tables show top ten data by both volume and rate and then the set of top pairs of organizations sharing data.
Other statistics about data to and from this country, including a Sankey graph for the top sources by volume, is then listed.
Please note that rate will be zero if only one sampled flow was detected.
All times are displayed in browser local time.

targets.query: meta.src_country_name:$Country AND meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND -meta.dst_country_name:"" AND ((!(_exists_:meta.is_network_testing)) OR meta.is_network_testing:no OR meta.is_network_testing:$is_net_test)
